attributes.comment:
Please don't increase the fees for ADOPTIVE FAMILIES! We already have a great financial burden.
This will take away from the money we need for the care of ophans that we rescue in the world.
Many of us have tried to adopt from the U.S., only to have the birth mothers change their minds - it
happened to us twice. International adoption has enabled us to adopt our son - a great blessing in
all of our lives. KEEP THE FEES LOW. Many of us have to file TWICE because the approval is
only good for 18 months. We are in this situation, trying to adopt a brother for our son. With
adoptions taking longer and longer, most of us have to file again as they do not permit us to renew
our filing. You are going to place terrible burden on the families who are doing good in this world!
Many borrow and go into debt to have a forever family :-(
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anne Files
